name: Manunya30
text: Gage was the Tech who worked on my APU . Very professional.Highly recommended !!Thanks a lot!!

name: Mohamed Ramadan
text: Fast delivery, access to the yard is in 36th St.

name: Darrell Zanders
text: The customer service was friendly. Everything is working well so far after the APU (auxillary power unit) repair. Shop personnel didn't say much.

name: Alberto Guerra Iser
text: The best and good recommended prices 100%

name: Tony Sexton
text: Quick and easy. Popped in to grab service parts for my APU. I was out the door in less than 10 minutes. Prices were less than expected.

name: Daniel Boyle
text: Went in for a oil leak. Christy who checked me in was extremely nice. Nick was the Tech who worked on my APU . He found my leak quickly. After fixing leak he checked feon level and cleared codes. Thanks ALOT for getting me in and out so quickly !!!!

name: said Abdulle (Natural-Goal)
text: Here's good place I don't remember guy who repairs my unit but he's great guy and professional, I will come back here for sure if I had to, I recommend everyone to check this place

name: E Eigmer
text:
I came to this location because my APU was acting up. The office staff was great and very quick to help.
Tom did the repairs. He was fast, through, and professional. He took a few minutes to inform me just how the APU functions and issues to lookout for.
If you want the kind of service America used to expect, this is your place. Outstanding crew!

resp.text:
Thanks for your business!
We appreciate your kind words.
Have a safe trip ,we’ll be here if you need us.

name: John Groesbeck
text: Alt went out on trlr.very fast on repairs in/out in 45min.made my pu on time since they were fast on repairs.thanx

name: Carl Jones
text: Service staff done great job  got me out fast as possible

name: Robert Clemons
text: Tom was the best. I was at the one in Chattanooga and they couldn't fix it

name: Super Trucker!
text: After having bad service from Nashville and  Greenville I stopped in to see if these guys could solve my regen issue on my APU.  It didn't look good at the beginning,  but the whole team came together to find that Nashville caused some problems with wiring.  Great bunch of guys over there and even called me after hours to see if my regen issue was resolved which it was.  Thanks alot guys!

name: Michael Smith
text: Very nice people efficient and let me stay overnight on the premises

name: Joe Dirt
text: Unloaded quickly

name: Anthony Vestal
text: Fast knowledgeable serice

name: white jr vernon
text: I want to thank the staff at Thermo king for the Great service.  Christy for making me feel at home and to Chad the master mechanic for doing a great and speedy job to get me back on the road!!! SHOUT OUT TO MY NEW THERMO KING FAMILY OF BIRMINGHAM AL.

name: Melinda S
text: Great Service

name: Adam F
text:
I came here for an easy fix but I was overcharged (bill very unclear) basically the lady there charge you whatever she wants and more than any thermo king shop around the country
They also charge you 3% in ur bill as convenient fee for running any kind of card as a payment without even asking you if you have cash

name: Jamie Pouliot
text: I haven't been here in a few years.. but when my APU went out the fixed it quick and always done right never had any issues with their work .. they usually had to fix other shops shoddy work.. i highly recommend them ... the only down fall is their location

name: Jim and Sniffers
text: Friendly and willing to go out of there way to fix what's wrong thank you Tom still running great

name: Terrance Brown
text: I'm a truck only can service on Saturday and they are closed....

name: DIGNITY LOGISTICS INC
text:
My driver got there at 4:30 p, there was nobody there in front of him. They didn't take him until 5 pm so they can charge after-hour fee. It took them less than 15 minutes to add 6 gallons of oil to the reefer, and they charged over $430.
When I asked to help me out since it's literally nothing 15 minutes job, she said no. She was absolutely mean!

name: Jeff Hunt
text: Did an awesome job fixing my reefer!!!! Quick friendly excellent service.awesome staff! Thank yous for a great job!!!

resp.text:
Thank you ,for your business !
Have a safe trip .
We’ll be here if you need us.

name: Stuart Raburn
text: Awesome experience!  We had a problem with our refrigerated van on Friday night [farmer's market is Sat morning].  We called, they answered, got me in touch with a tech [Keith] who quickly diagnosed the problem and helped walk me though fixing the A/C.  No produce lost and we're ready for the market tomorrow - thanks very much to Keith and Thermo King!

name: Enos Talane
text: Charged me $300 for 2lbs of freon. RIP OFF.  RUN.

name: A D
text: I came here to fix my reefer trailer, then they fixed in 3 minutes thanks for mechanic! But the lady in shop she made bill 352$! I asked why they changed 352$ for what ? She said minimum charge is 121$then I asked how?why? What? She said we charge for what  we do! What it means? They should charge for one hour 121$ that all I need ! Please fire this 👩‍💻!

name: Joseph Gebhart
text: Very nice and noligable!

name: نوح نوحي
text:
Very friendly ppl . Very professional
I've got my reffeer repaired right and quickly.
They do care how to repair your Refeer right way and professional .
They really deserve 5 stars  .

resp.text: Thanks so much for your business!

name: W H
text:
Very rude and nasty, but they got the job done on the second attempt. In 4 HRS.
They talk while chewing tobacco and when you don’t understand they huff and puff and get mad.
I really don’t like the service I got it’s like I’m asking for a favor instead of paying them....but they got the job done.

name: CNI TRANSPORT
text: They were so helpful especially Tom...

resp.text:
Thanks for your business !
We’ll be here if you need us...

name: Clay P
text: Very professional staff

name: Orlando Garza
text: Great ,fast service. Got refer unit repair within 1 hour

name: Tonya Browning
text: This place is ridiculous we went in to get our apu fixed 921 dollars later they say oh your fixed good to go they ran the Apu for 2 minutes said it's good we leave get down the road it won't run it says now the alternator went out we just had one put on 3 months ago and they said it's not there problem...

name: gary whitener
text: Great service!!! Nice looking secretary

name: Francis Hughes
text: Excellent service 👍

name: Oleksandr Stefanyuk
text: Best ever service .....   Nice people....

name: Chris Williams
text: Good service

name: Gary Lott
text: Got me in and out

name: Mozelle Brown
text: Great service

name: Jimmy Bigbee
text: Bad neighborhood

name: Martin Reyna
text: Great service thank you guys

name: B Hammoudeh
text: Fast service

name: PIER 22 LOGISTICS
text: THIEFS... read my open letter

name: MicHael Atchison
text: Good service
